Need help setting up network with Samba. I can't login
Fryguy: tried it. Still can't login.
then you don't have your share set up correctly.  make sure you are logging into the correct workgroup or domain
and turn off ntlm v2 in vista
use group policy editor to do it
did you install the kernel headers package
/usr/bin/passwd is an executable, your password is stored in /etc/shadow
use the passwd command to change it
if you are su, just type "passwd <username>" to set a new passwd for that user
then your workgroups are probably messed up
then figure  out what firewall you have on vista that is preventing you from pinging, as that is probably the cause of your other networking problem
